title: As his E, Veigar should create a fucking black hole
body:
I don't know about you, but when i use an ability called "Event horizon" (the point of a black hole from where you cannot escape) that has a long ass cooldown and costs half of my mana pool, i'm expecting something more awesome than 5 pillars made in MS Paint

Isn't Veigar supposed to distort the very fabric of space in order to destroy his enemies?

Oh, and you know that ability **named after the Big Bang itself**? It still barely takes half of a person's HP.

EDIT: Here, Mr. Super Villain here gave a pretty good example of what i think should replace Veigars _5 pillars of doom_

http://31.media.tumblr.com/a4bb07ca068f1ba632bb5051bea4b603/tumblr_nnwsi0ddb71tztfpyo1_500.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Its Batman,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PskFer6M,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-29T20:15:51.656+0000)
>
> Why does the hole have to be black?

This may be the most ignorant comment I've ever read
It's not black, it's just the absence of light which appears black.  The object is so dense that light can't escape it.  Imagine all of earth crushed down to the size of a quarter.

(copy/paste from one of my posts about the subject of putting a gravity field inside Veigar cage )

It could break Veigar support though.

UNLESS it's some sort of an attraction (like a gravity field, a black hole) towards the middle **BUT scaling on ap, with low base attraction**
example : Enemy units/champions inside Event Horizon are pulled to the center with a movespeed of 10/20/30/40/50 + 20% AP
(examples -> 300 AP at rank 5 = 110 movespeed ; 500 AP = 150 movespeed; 1000 AP = 250 movespeed)
note : they can still move, but they are dragged in, if they walk towards the edge they're slower, if they walk towards the center they're faster.
2nd possibility : same idea but with a repulsive force that pushes them to the edge.

Which would also further emphasis his lategame scaling, which is still heavily countered by items.

My approach to it would be to have the attraction stay the same, but have the sturdiness of the drag scale with AP (if that  makes sense). With a 0 AP Veigar, it would be easy to get out of the black hole, but with a 1000 AP Veigar, it would be barely possible to move.
As long as it has a delay and doesn't have the 10 year duration Enigma's ult has giving him an awesome and practical cc like that would be great for his current state.
Barely takes half a person's HP away? You must be playing Veigar wrong, because one ult lategame and the enemy mid laner evaporates.
